items.sentence: I think Mary is too young to have her ears pierced.
I think Tom is the one most likely to win the race.
I think that French is the most beautiful language.

Are you seriously thinking about driving all night?
Tom walked out of the bar with a smile on his face.
Tom wants Mary to make sure John does his homework.
Tom was sick, so I stayed home to take care of him.
Tom was signing autographs in front of the theater.
Are you sure you don\'t want to go fishing with us?
Anyone would find it hard to run on such a hot day.
At the meeting, we came up with a lot of new ideas.
Tom couldn\'t quite bring himself to strangle Mary.
Tom couldn\'t tell me what I really wanted to know.
I offered Tom some money, but he wouldn\'t take it.
I haven\'t been feeling well for the past few days.
Tom has lots of acquaintances but very few friends.

Tom has recently been trying to improve his French.
